title: Trump says Venezuela agrees to receive illegal migrants captured in US
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday that Venezuela has agreed to receive all Venezuelan illegal migrants captured in the United States and pay for their transport.

title: Trump revokes temporary protected status for 600,000 Venezuelans
shortDescription: The Trump administration has rescinded a decision that extended Temporary Protected Status (TPS) for approximately 600,000 Venezuelans, putting them at risk of deportation.

title: Trump sits on billions in funding despite court order, states say
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge John McConnell said the Office of Management and Budget's about-face on pausing federal payments and contracts was in "name only."

title: Trump's early moves to reshape the government | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Anti-Trump and anti-Elon Musk protesters rally in cities across the country. | Why younger retirees depend mostly on Social Security.

title: Trump to form task force aimed at rooting out 'anti-Christian bias'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he'll form a Department of Justice led task force to "eradicate anti-Christian bias" within the federal government.

title: What to know about Trump's buyouts for federal workers on decision day
shortDescription: More than 2 million federal employees across the country face an end-of day deadline to make a life-altering decision: resign or stay in their jobs.

title: How powerful is Trump? Here's what we know now
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has pushed the limits of his authority more than we've seen in modern times. How much power does he have? Here's what we know now.

title: Why Trump's military deportation flights cost more than charters
shortDescription: The Trump administration has carried out 10 deportations on military planes so far. They cost more and move fewer migrants than charters.

title: House Oversight Committee blocks Elon Musk subpoena
shortDescription: Democrats in the House Oversight Committee failed to subpoena Elon Musk in a heated interaction before a vote without debate.

title: A new ballroom in the White House? Trump says he'd like that.
shortDescription: In 2016, before he took office the first time, Trump offered to spend $100 million for a new White House ballroom. He never got approval.

title: Panic across federal workforce as Trump's resignation deadline looms
shortDescription: Federal workers say they're in a mode of fear, shock and uncertainty as they decide whether to accept President Trump's buyout offer.

title: Trump signs order banning trans women from sports teams
shortDescription: President Trump signed an executive order barring transgender women and girls from playing on school sports teams.

title: House GOP panel kills Democrats' call to subpoena Elon Musk over DOGE
shortDescription: The heated exchange early in a House Oversight hearing about "Rightsizing Government' leads to Democrat protests that Musk is operating with impunity

title: Trump signs order targeting transgender women's sports
shortDescription: Federal officials could withhold funding from schools that allow transgender women and girls to play women's sports.
